search_results.title: Tiya Miles Biography
search_results.snippet: Tiya Miles is the author of three prize-winning works in the history of early American race relations, including most recently, The Dawn of Detroit: A ...

search_results.title: Tiya Miles | Department of History
search_results.snippet: Miles is the author of seven books and the only current two-time winner of Yale's Frederick Douglass Prize for the study of slavery, abolition, and resistance.

search_results.title: Jack Miles
search_results.snippet: John R. Miles (born July 30, 1942) is an American author. He is a winner of the Pulitzer Prize, [1] a Guggenheim Fellowship [2] and the MacArthur Fellowship.
